mapper.select: /* SELECT getInbdUid */ SELECT nextval('SEQ_INBD_MST_UID') FROM DUAL;

/* SELECT getTaskUid */ SELECT nextval('SEQ_AS_TASK_UID') FROM DUAL;
/* SELECT getPtwyUid */ SELECT nextval('SEQ_INBD_PTWY_UID') FROM DUAL;
